subject: Golf
Yoga
lead_paragraph: Katherine Roberts, the founder of Yoga for Golfers, based in Scottsdale, Ariz., and a regular contributor for The Golf Channel, has established programs around the country over the last decade.
snippet: Katherine Roberts, the founder of Yoga for Golfers, based in Scottsdale, Ariz., and a regular contributor for The Golf Channel, has established programs around the country over the last decade.
